Pike

Pike started as a joke, mocking Rob Pike's dismissal of syntax coloring. It was mostly based on Go's Playground and did not contain any syntax highlighting, then Walleye came around with bold for control flow (in the spirit of the Sema theme family), and after a while I gave in to my inner child and built Pike Caviar with full syntax highlighting.
